name: Playstation
comments: The monster console that killed all comers

name: Gameboy
comments: I was 5 when this came out.nStill the best system to play tetris on.

name: Playstation 2
comments: Pretty much the best system ever. EMOTION ENGINE!

name: DS & 3DS
comments: DS Lite remains the only system I have bought on Release Day! On loan to Grandma Tito. 3DS is Special Edition for Zelda: A Link Between Worlds.

name: Saturn
comments: The Sega Saturn. It's named after it's internal project name: Project Saturn. All Sega consoles were named after planets at the time.

name: Entertainment System
comments: So many legendary game franchises got their start here.

name: Game Boy Advanced
comments: More colors and two extra buttons than the old Game Boy. Also, it's games can be played on the DS.

name: 3D0
comments: Sometimes I laugh at myself for owning a 3D0. This thing was never top of the line. It's a good example of how it takes a certain type of company to make a game system work.

name: Dreamcast
comments: 9-9-99 was a great day for gamers! Sega Dreamcast was the first system to have a modem in it from day one! It's VMU memory card was so powerful it could play games too! 4 controller ports for fun party games and a powerful processor to push graphics beyond the Playstation 2. Sadly, it was the final Sega console and left the market before it could really shine. I own a regular Dreamcast and a black Sega Sports one.

name: Gamegear
comments: SEGA DOES WHAT NINTENDONT got used a lot with the Gamegear. It could do lots of colors and had a nice screen for the time. It was also a huge battery hog.

name: Genesis
comments: The system that got me into gaming. This was a present from santa back when I was just a kid. Lots of fun playing games with my sister and Ben. I also own the Sega Nomad, the portable version of the Genesis. Bought the Nomad on March 10, 2007 at a pawn shop in Reno, NV.

name: TurboGrafx-16
comments: I own the japanese version, the PC Engine. Known for having lots of good SHMUP games.

name: Playstation 3
comments: The big black expensive Playstation 3 was suppose to change computing with its CELL processors, but it ended up just being a really good game console and media center.
